title: Soy-Vinegar Dipping Sauce
source: A Very Chinese Cookbook - Kevin Pang
categories: A Very Chinese Cookbook - Kevin Pang
directions: 1. Combine all ingredients in a bowl.
2. Let sit at room temperature until flavors meld, about 30 minutes.
3. (Sauce can be refrigerated for up to 1 day; let come to room temperature before serving.)
